name: RPS [Pre-Alpha Prototype]
description:
"Over 900 years ago, we were gifted with an inner power from a higher entity. This sent us into an Age of Miracles, causing our biological and technological abilities to thrive at an exponential rate. 

However, this was all taken from us when an Evil sent our race into the brink of extinction... As one of our final acts of survival, I was sent into this dimension to destroy the heart of the Evil. Now, whether I actually succeed in destroying it is another story...

And now, here I am. Stuck in this realm, and I dont even know where to start..."

This is a prototype build of a 2D top-down shooter I have been working on for quite a bit. The short introduction to the plot above is currently not incorporated into any version of the game.

So, about the game! There are 4 classes to choose from, each containing their unique play style and abilities:

ClassPower Charge AbilityPerkLevel-UpsFanaticChannel the power within you into two streams of rapid-firing bright-bolts in opposing direction, vaporizing anything that wishes to stand in its wayDefeated enemies will drop additional power energyBullet-charge capacity increases more than HPEvokerWhisper to the power within to merge energy into volatile orbs of light that will shatter upon impactCollecting bullet-charge whilst your it is full grants health. Defeated enemies have a chance to grant healthHP capacity increases more than Bullet ChargeEndemicCast a cataclysmic of wave of dynamic energy that inflicts damage and disorder towards your enemiesDefeated enemies have a chance to detonate into shardsHP & Bullet Charge capacity increase at an equal rateRoverUtilize the power within to amplify your speed, your fire-rate for all weaponry, gain unlimited bullet charge and leave a trail behind that slows your enemies downBullets have a chance to return bullet charge upon impact HP & Bullet Charge capacity increase at an equal rate

Levelling up will unlock you new tools at your disposal, such as unique abilities and projectile types.

In this test version, you are limited to what you can explore, and there is only one "boss" that you can fight. Once you reach a certain EXP Level, you can choose to teleport to the boss.
